alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 09 at 6:00PM MST until August 09 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The Pipeline Fire East in... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 900 PM MST. * At 559 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Pipeline Fire eastern drainages. Between 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Pipeline Fire East. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Pipeline Fire East. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Wupatki Trails, Pine Mountain Estates, Locket Meadow CG, Timberline, Sugarloaf Mountain, Fernwood, Hutchison Acres, Little Elden Springs Horse Camp, Schultz Pass, Hutchinson Acres, Inner Basin Pumphouse, Sunset Crater N.M., Macann Estates, Agassiz Peak, Lockett Meadow Campground and Little Elden Spring Horse Camp. This includes U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 427 and 430. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Flash flooding is occurring or imminent downstream of the Pipeline Fire scar, including Wupatki Trails, Fernwood, Hutchinson Acres, Macann Estates and Doney Park. Flood waters will impact residential roads. Shelter in place until the waters recede. Stay out of flood waters!
